thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com
thread.title: Marc

author: Marc
title: Marc
text: Purchased in December 2016 a Compact Stella Cherry and an Elderberry Bush, both of fruiting size. Had no updates on-line on order status through January and February - called occasionally and was only told that order would ship when all items were ready. At end of February, on another persistent call in, finally told that the Stella size I ordered never came in from grower. Staff person who helped me was great in changing order to smaller size Stella and adding a blueberry bush to order so no refund or additional charge. Plants doing well so far. I must criticize, though, in that if I didn't call them and persist in status of order, I might still be waiting for the order to ship, so communication to customer of true and current status of orders needs to be improved.
